feed.title: TimeTagger Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for TimeTagger: v23.11.4
entry.content:
• Fix bug that the total was the taking tag filters into account - https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/433
  • Can unselect tags by clicking on them - https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/434

entry.title: New release for TimeTagger: v24.4.1
entry.content:
App

  • Fixes iOS zoom issue by @axelknock in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/456
  • Add option for Monday-Friday week by @staddi99 in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/458
  • More shortcuts by @Tagirijus in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/467
  • Enable notifications by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/470

For self-hosters

  • Pass an import string rather than a function reference to enable multi-worker and reload support. by @michaellenaghan in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/457
  • add a script to merge records of multiple databases by @joergsteffens in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/455

New Contributors

  • @michaellenaghan made their first contribution in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/457
  • @axelknock made their first contribution in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/456
  • @staddi99 made their first contribution in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/458
  • @joergsteffens made their first contribution in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/455
  • @Tagirijus made their first contribution in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/467

Personal note

I'm rather occupied with other projects, so I find that I don't have as much time to work on TimeTagger as I want to. In the last days I did some work on timetagger.app to refactor things into more components with specific tasks, which will make room for future improvements such as teams ...

Full Changelog: https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/compare/v23.11.4...v24.4.1

entry.title: New release for TimeTagger: v24.07.1
entry.content:
App

  • Changed that the "now"-line was barely visible in darkmode by @Tagirijus in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/476
  • Use standalone display for better user experience on Android. by @vchigrin in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/491
  • Fix recursion error due to early dates by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/494
  • Prevent negative timestamps, warn users when dates look odd by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/495
  • Make date visible on FireFix by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/496
  • Set stop button color based on running tag. by @vchigrin in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/492
  • Backspace can unselect all tags now by @Tagirijus in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/484
  • Tweak unselecting with backspace by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/497
  • Support for multiple date formats by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/498

Other

  • Update test for new asgineer by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/483

New Contributors

  • @vchigrin made their first contribution in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/491

Full Changelog: https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/compare/v24.4.1...v24.07.1

entry.title: New release for TimeTagger: v24.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Snap to previous day if we haven't passed the dayoffset yet by @duxovni in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/509
  • Add offset for nightshift by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/514
  • Prevent gap when having many small records by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/515
  • Compact clusters with many records in timeline by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/516

New Contributors

  • @duxovni made their first contribution in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/509

Full Changelog: https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/compare/v24.07.1...v24.12.1

entry.title: New release for TimeTagger: v24.12.2
entry.content:
This is a security fix. If you use the standard __main__ startup script and host it on a public server, you are encouraged to update to this version.

What's Changed

  • Add check for localhost auth by @almarklein in https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/pull/518
  • The default binding is changed from 0.0.0.0:80 to 127.0.0.1:8080.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/almarklein/timetagger/compare/v24.12.1...v24.12.2
